name: Drop Dodge Die Repeat!
description:
DROP DODGE DIE REPEAT Is a action-platformer, where the player must navigate through challenging puzzles in order to complete levels.  

But wait there's a twist. When you die from either a flying shuriken or deadly spikes, its not all that bad. This is because your dead carcass stays there as a make-shift platform

CONTROLLS:

"A" And "D" To Move Left And Right.

"W" Or "SPACE BAR" To Jump.

TIPS:

1. Don't die if you don't need to.

2. Try to think your route through a level before you attempt it.

3. Have fun!
